author: egli
msg: Remove the scheduler menu entry from the Help section since the
functionality is now in the scheduler tab in the site area and since a
click on the menu causes an exception.

msg: Adapted a relative path to make sure it also works in the context of a

author: egli
msg: Moved the publication specific publication screen from xslt/publishing

author: egli
msg: Moved the one-form editor to a separate pipeline so we can do specific
error handling for it. The sax-parsing exception (that can occur if
you enter non-validating xml in the one-form editor) is now handled
and a nice error screen is rendered.
